mapper.select: select member_id, nick, member_img, like_cnt from (select member_id, nick, member_img, like_cnt from (select m.member_id, nick, member_img, like_cnt from (select creator_id, count(*) like_cnt from creatorlike group by creator_id) cl join memberTbl m on cl.creator_id = m.member_id) cls order by like_cnt desc) where rownum <= 8

select review_no, order_no, content, img1, star, writedate, member_id, member_img from (select review_no, r.order_no, content, img1, star, writedate, m.member_id, member_img from reviewTbl r join orderTbl o on r.order_no=o.order_no join memberTbl m on o.member_id=m.member_id where img1 is not null order by star desc) rTbl where rownum <= 5
